name: resume-twin
description: Portfolio & Resume Generation Platform with AI-powered optimization

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -v
scripts.test:unit: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/services/ -v
scripts.test:integration: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/integration/ -v
scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -v --cov=app --cov-report=html
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check . --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.type-check:backend: cd backend && uv run mypy app/
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run black . && uv run isort .
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
scripts.format:check:backend: cd backend && uv run black --check . && uv run isort --check-only .
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && uv sync
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test

author: Resume Twin Team
